column4: i have a very stragne probelm, ubuntu freezes when i login to the gdm, it doesnt display the gnome splash screen but prays the login chime, i can move the mouse, but nothig appears, gnome doesnt load. in .xsession errors theres a load of errors about ICE, and not being able to mkdir /dev/X, any ideas?
they dont work out of the box? :S
